Package object

Class OBJ_Fireball

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.Projectile
object.OBJ_Fireball
public class OBJ_Fireball extends Projectile
This class implements the object Fireball. This class inherits the Entity Class.
Author:
Sadiyah
